post.title: Why is this sub so hostile towards lgbt+ pepole, black pepole and jews?

body:
I'm hostile to these people because instead of acting as individuals, they've discarded that and adopted a label, badge and group identity for themselves in these so called inclusive groups.

Your sexual preference should not be something of a group identity that gets to do the thinking for you, I am gay, that doesn't mean I belong to a group that calls itself LGBT+ and nor do any of it's ideas really interest me, instead my association ends at me being gay, that's part of who I am. Somehow, people have taken LGBT+ to the extreme and it's become their entire identity, I find that disgusting and greatly unlikable, nobody really wants to know what your sexual preferences are as the first and last thing about you.

Black people? They're ok, I don't like BLM if that's what you mean.

Jews? I don't know about, but I grew up in a Christian country, I prefer Christians but i'm not hostile to other religions rather than sceptical of them all.
body_html:
I'm hostile to these people because instead of acting as individuals, they've discarded that and adopted a label, badge and group identity for themselves in these so called inclusive groups.

Your sexual preference should not be something of a group identity that gets to do the thinking for you, I am gay, that doesn't mean I belong to a group that calls itself LGBT+ and nor do any of it's ideas really interest me, instead my association ends at me being gay, that's part of who I am. Somehow, people have taken LGBT+ to the extreme and it's become their entire identity, I find that disgusting and greatly unlikable, nobody really wants to know what your sexual preferences are as the first and last thing about you.

Black people? They're ok, I don't like BLM if that's what you mean.

Jews? I don't know about, but I grew up in a Christian country, I prefer Christians but i'm not hostile to other religions rather than sceptical of them all.

post.title: Why is this sub so hostile towards lgbt+ pepole, black pepole and jews?

body: The question has asked me specifically to make a judgement on these groups of people, I'm sure these people as individuals are a lot more human and interesting than the petty judgments I've just given them, a better question would be asking what makes me so hostile towards people. Largely, I think it's because everyone holds irrational views, including myself. I haven't met a Jew once in my life so asking me to judge them is like asking a blind man that never knew of or saw an elephant to describe that animal in detail.
body_html: The question has asked me specifically to make a judgement on these groups of people, I'm sure these people as individuals are a lot more human and interesting than the petty judgments I've just given them, a better question would be asking what makes me so hostile towards people. Largely, I think it's because everyone holds irrational views, including myself. I haven't met a Jew once in my life so asking me to judge them is like asking a blind man that never knew of or saw an elephant to describe that animal in detail.

post.title: Why is this sub so hostile towards lgbt+ pepole, black pepole and jews?

body:
I've mostly blocked users and groups who are mostly just interested in trolling, or have the IQ of a slug.

On free speech platforms, you'll get some percentage of people who fit one of the following:

* The hate free speech, so they post the most vile crap to make the site look bad.
* They attack a group because they wish that group harm.
* They're just 13-year-olds on the internet, with the maturity to match.
* They've been banned from every other platform for being a piece of shit.

There's some nuance though to most discussion, which is what most of the more pro-censorship platforms miss.  For example:

Example1:

* Person-1 just posts the n-word on everything, and contributes little to discussion.
* Person-2 points out BLM is a marxist organization, which doesn't care about black lives, adds to racial tensions, and is extremely violent.
* Person-3 notices the absurd amount of black-crime in FBI statistics, and that many black communities glorify things which leads to high poverty and crime.

Example2:

* Person-1 always blames jews in every discussion, no matter the context, and spams links to websites that are 90% anti-jew content.
* Person-2 notices when some jews or jewish organizations, like the ADL, Soros, or Isreal, act like pieces of shit.

Example3:

* Person-1 who thinks anyone who fits any L B G T characteristic needs to be put to death, because their religion tells them to.
* Person-2 who notices the political bias of the LBGT-activist community, their bullshit politics, annoying behavior
* Person-3 who technically fits in one of LBGT categories, but fucking hate the LBGT politics.

Generally, I'd only block Person-1 in each example because they're just fucking idiots.  The Person-2's, etc have at least put thought into what they're posting, even if they're sometimes right or wrong.
body_html:
I've mostly blocked users and groups who are mostly just interested in trolling, or have the IQ of a slug.

On free speech platforms, you'll get some percentage of people who fit one of the following:

  • The hate free speech, so they post the most vile crap to make the site look bad.
  • They attack a group because they wish that group harm.
  • They're just 13-year-olds on the internet, with the maturity to match.
  • They've been banned from every other platform for being a piece of shit.

There's some nuance though to most discussion, which is what most of the more pro-censorship platforms miss. For example:

Example1:

  • Person-1 just posts the n-word on everything, and contributes little to discussion.
  • Person-2 points out BLM is a marxist organization, which doesn't care about black lives, adds to racial tensions, and is extremely violent.
  • Person-3 notices the absurd amount of black-crime in FBI statistics, and that many black communities glorify things which leads to high poverty and crime.

Example2:

  • Person-1 always blames jews in every discussion, no matter the context, and spams links to websites that are 90% anti-jew content.
  • Person-2 notices when some jews or jewish organizations, like the ADL, Soros, or Isreal, act like pieces of shit.

Example3:

  • Person-1 who thinks anyone who fits any L B G T characteristic needs to be put to death, because their religion tells them to.
  • Person-2 who notices the political bias of the LBGT-activist community, their bullshit politics, annoying behavior
  • Person-3 who technically fits in one of LBGT categories, but fucking hate the LBGT politics.

Generally, I'd only block Person-1 in each example because they're just fucking idiots. The Person-2's, etc have at least put thought into what they're posting, even if they're sometimes right or wrong.

post.title: Why is this sub so hostile towards lgbt+ pepole, black pepole and jews?

body:
>  But the Jew thing is just a meme.

I wish it was.  Sometimes it is people being edgy.  But there is a percentage of people out there who would kill any person who happens to be a jew, if given the opportunity.  Yes, there are the modern-nazis of course, though it can be hard to tell what percentage are actually serious.  I'm referring to something that is more common in some Arabic countries and cultures.
body_html:
But the Jew thing is just a meme.

I wish it was. Sometimes it is people being edgy. But there is a percentage of people out there who would kill any person who happens to be a jew, if given the opportunity. Yes, there are the modern-nazis of course, though it can be hard to tell what percentage are actually serious. I'm referring to something that is more common in some Arabic countries and cultures.
